BusStoppa is an application I developed in my spare time to put on my CV.

Dan Brough is a developer based in Wellington, New Zealand and can be contacted at: busstoppa@danbrough.org

This software and it\'s developer are in no way affiliated with Metlink

Version v2.09-beta01: Moving to Metlink open-data

Version v2.07: Map fix. Reverted to Google Maps.

Version v2.03: Fix for maps not rendering on Android-9.

Version v2.01: Long press a stop in the history to rename it.

Version v2.0: Version 2.0 Update.

All data now comes from metlinks live data service

Removed all dependencies on Google Play Services (mapping) and replaced with OpenStreetMaps

Version 2 is written in Kotlin.
Source code is available on GitHub
